 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַכְבָּר‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[1Sam.6.4|1Sam 6:4]]</sup> ==mouse== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עַכְבְּרָא‎</span>; Syriac (in Lexicons) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ([[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>22</sup>); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> plural ***mares murum*** [[BDB#Frey|Frey]] ([[BDB#Kam|Kam]]), compare also [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>As 338</sup>; Arabic of ***jerboa*** [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>K 302</sup>; see [[BDB#Tristr|Tristr]]<sup>NHB 122</sup> [[BDB#FFP|FFP]]<sup>10 ff.</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָע‎</span> unclean [[Lev.11.29|Lev 11:29]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[Isa.66.17|Isa 66:17]] (compare [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Sem i. 275, 2nd ed. 293</sup>); plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַכְבְּרֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(ה)זָהָב‎</span> [[1Sam.6.4|1Sam 6:4]]; [[1Sam.6.11|1Sam 6:11]]; [[1Sam.6.18|1Sam 6:18]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צַלְמֵי עַכְבְּרֵיכֶם‎</span> v[[1Sam.6.5|1Sam 6:5]].
